roleset.name: economic value
roleset.note: WORTH-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1. (from worth.01-j)

example.name: all args
example.text: The RIAA is trying to tell you that the music I have stolen thus far is worth $2,000,000 to them
example.arg: the music I have stolen thus far

roleset.name: worthy of, deserving
roleset.note: WORTH-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1. (from worth.02-j)
WORTHY-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on SMS. (from worthy.01-j)

example.name: both args
example.text: I find the old Star Trek movies to be boring but this one is worth seeing.

example.name: both args, empty it
example.text: Also , as you bemoan the West . It 's worth remembering you would n't have had a country without us
example.arg: you wouldn't have had a country without us

example.name: worth it
example.text: It did take longer than I expected , but that can happen even if you hire a contractor to do everything for you , so I would say it was worth it .
